Reviews.Title: “A big mistake”
Reviews.Author: Rahulismyname
Reviews.Content: visiting rome solo traveler march 2012 believed offpeak period season starts easter reservation advance 4 days website price easily able 3 star neighborhood 4 star little reasons booking reviews tripadvisor usually tripadvisor helped pick hotel time reviews user time happened useless based reviews found website distance termini yes hotel located 200300 meters termini station whereas actually hotels neighborhood lot receptionist morning evening dont speak understand english nightmare communicating wireless connection charges 5 euros day youll reception access actually access network third floor floors receptionist told complimentary breakfast dont theres free special buffet dont excited word rest elevator etc mentioned people highly recommend staying hotel please lot options

Reviews.Title: “Great budget hotel, plus breakfast in bed!”
Reviews.Author: DavidandBrigid C
Reviews.Content: hotel near train station hotel rome comfortable friendly staff bottle wine forgot corkscrew shower clean water pressure youre overweight doors internet extra breakfast delivered morning time choosing 79 croissant drink choosing croissants cappuccino orange juice delivered 8am day id breakfast bed budget hotel stayed 1st floor 2nd windows bit noisy hotel equipped soundproofing windows closed blackout shades slept 14 hours werent nearby sights overall excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: Karen H
Reviews.Content: husband spent nights touring street booked bedroom apartment living kitchen bath 100 euros deal friends street paying 175 tiny little double apartment clean staff friendly true dont speak lot english computer translator answer questions location 5 min walk train metro stop main sites easy walk recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “apartment at Touring”
Reviews.Author: Megan M
Reviews.Content: stayed apartments touring mom apartments option major travel booking sites book own web site spacious apartment bedroom single beds living dinning table spacious bathroom kitchen nice refrigerator stay brought breakfast time consisted type coffee cappuccino espresso americano etc croissant cookie nice wake fresh cappuccino arriving door air conditioning staff helpful enjoyed stay touring

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: yariq
Reviews.Content: awful hotel it’s tiny staff speaks english little doesn’t speak english forget english pay stay credit card checkout i’ve told woman reception suddenly stopped understand english pay cash spend money socalled cap moderate coffee croissant tiny biscuits breakfast poor rome visit nearest cafe mcdonalds space bags course wasn’t safe box leave values reception desk wasn’t airconditioner fan broken fix using bathroom strange equipment saving water impossible toilet shower shower cubicle looked elder location subway station near hotel it’s close railway station attractions close hotel easily reach famous foot street hotel situated noisy morning till late night hear noise restaurants music sounds cars motors it’s impossible close windows absence airconditioner you’ll slipping oven hotel it’s price choose don’t spend lot money you’re rome winter strongly recommend avoid hotel summer

Reviews.Title: “Low cost = Low Returns!”
Reviews.Author: tboyce32
Reviews.Content: unenjoyable experience particular staff yelling accomodating 10 minutes bug crawling floor reason recommend hotel tight budget willing rough bit location stay comfortable laying street staff speak english continually street hotel questions

Reviews.Title: “been robbed”
Reviews.Author: ratomat
Reviews.Content: 31 day roma perfect location fare value day mistake book dinner cleaned money sheet book missing 50€ course respond completely quantity answers reception course cleaned woman called don´t name called fault word word ill near hotel clean

Reviews.Title: “Budget wise, it's good”
Reviews.Author: dmed
Reviews.Content: 2 star hotel worth price low location near train terminal staff didnt ive read bad reviews strikingly bad breakfast minimal spacious bathroom ok shower bit note street noisy walls arent thick anytime leaves enters miss double beds dont exist 2 single beds carefull fall youre looking low budget fits location pricing hotel
